analyzed: 廣大寶樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼經
translated: Dhāraṇī Sūtra of the Secret of the Well-Abiding Vast and Great Jeweled Palace
Scroll 1

original: 大唐天竺三藏菩提流志
analyzed: 大唐天竺三藏菩提流志
translated: Tripiṭaka Master Bodhiruci of India during the Great Tang Dynasty

original: 奉　詔譯1 序品序品第一如是我聞。
analyzed: 奉　詔譯1 序品序品第一如是我聞。
translated: Chapter 1: Introduction. Thus have I heard.
At one time the Buddha was in the great city of Rājagṛha.

original: 於初會時降伏拘胝魔軍。
analyzed: 於初會時降伏拘胝魔軍。
translated: At the time of the first assembly, he subdued koṭis of Māra's armies.
And subdued all non-Buddhists.
Abandoning birth and death, he crossed over the turbulent currents.

original: 是時那由他百千殑伽羅頻婆羅魔軍遍世界。
analyzed: 是時那由他百千殑伽羅頻婆羅魔軍遍世界。
translated: At that time, Māra's armies, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, pervaded the world.
At that time, the World-Honored One, with the Buddha's spiritual power,
transformed this great earth into all being made of vajra.

original: 令贍部洲有情之類不聞恐怖。
analyzed: 令贍部洲有情之類不聞恐怖。
translated: He caused the sentient beings of Jambudvīpa to not hear any fear.
At that time, Māra's armies rained down various weapons.
They all transformed into flowers.
In the four thoroughfares of Rājagṛha,
lotus flowers naturally welled up from the ground.
The flowers had a thousand petals and were adorned with the seven treasures.

original: 黃金為臺瑠璃為莖高至梵天。
analyzed: 黃金為臺瑠璃為莖高至梵天。
translated: The golden platform was made of gold, the stem was made of vaidūrya, and it rose as high as the Brahma Heaven.
Emitting various kinds of light pervading the ten directions.
In the middle of the flower, a voice naturally emerged,
Reciting a dharani called Good Awakening.
The spell goes:

original: 南謨十方如來一唵摩尼二拔闍梨三哩哆耶四跋闍梨五摩囉賽儞六微陀囉波儞七賀那賀那八跋闍邏揭鞞九多羅婆耶多羅婆耶十薩縛上聲下同摩囉十一波上呼縛那儞十二吽呼憾反下同薩埵囉薩埵囉十三佛馱梅以諦戾十四薩縛呾他伽多十五跋闍囉迦嚧波十六地瑟恥柢十七薩婆奉十八時彼蓮華中。
analyzed: 南謨十方如來一唵摩尼二拔闍梨三哩哆耶四跋闍梨五摩囉賽儞六微陀囉波儞七賀那賀那八跋闍邏揭鞞九多羅婆耶多羅婆耶十薩縛上聲下同摩囉十一波上呼縛那儞十二吽呼憾反下同薩埵囉薩埵囉十三佛馱梅以諦戾十四薩縛呾他伽多十五跋闍囉迦嚧波十六地瑟恥柢十七薩婆奉十八時彼蓮華中。
translated: Namo to the Tathagatas of the ten directions, one, Om, Mani, two, Bajri, three, Rida-ya, four, Bajri, five, Mora-sai-ni, six, Vitarabha-ni, seven, Hana hana, eight, Bajra-garvi, nine, Tara-bhaya tara-bhaya, ten, Sarva-mora, eleven, Pava-bana-ni, twelve, Hum, the same as above, Satva-ra satva-ra, thirteen, Buddha-mayati-ri, fourteen, Sarva-tathagata, fifteen, Bajra-garbha, sixteen, Dhisthi, seventeen, Sarva-prapta, eighteen. At that time, in the lotus flower,
Having recited the spell, a wonderful voice emerged again,

original: 其聲遍三千大千世界言。
analyzed: 其聲遍三千大千世界言。
translated: The voice pervading the trichiliocosm, saying,
Excellent! Shakyamuni Tathagata!
Have already crossed the great ocean of birth and death.
They have destroyed the army of demons and are free from the dust of afflictions.
They have broken through the shell of ignorance and lit the great Dharma torch.
By the majestic power of this dhāraṇī,

original: 令此大地變成金剛降伏魔軍。
analyzed: 令此大地變成金剛降伏魔軍。
translated: It causes this great earth to transform into vajra and subdue the army of demons.
At that time, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva,
Joyfully leaping up with his body hair standing on end,
Bowed his head to the Buddha's feet and said to the Buddha,

original: 世尊今此明呪從何佛所最初而至。
analyzed: 世尊今此明呪從何佛所最初而至。
translated: World-Honored One, where did this illuminating mantra first come from?
I have never heard or seen it before.

original: 爾時佛告金剛密跡菩薩。
analyzed: 爾時佛告金剛密跡菩薩。
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva,

original: 有陀羅尼名廣大寶樓閣善住祕密。
analyzed: 有陀羅尼名廣大寶樓閣善住祕密。
translated: There is a dhāraṇī called the Secret of the Vast and Great Jeweled Tower's Good Abiding.

original: 由彼威力能令此界三千大千國土變為金剛。
analyzed: 由彼威力能令此界三千大千國土變為金剛。
translated: By its majestic power, it can transform this world's trichiliocosm into vajra.

original: 一切魔軍所有兵仗皆成蓮華。
analyzed: 一切魔軍所有兵仗皆成蓮華。
translated: All the weapons of the army of demons will become lotus flowers.

original: 由彼陀羅尼威神力故降諸魔眾。
analyzed: 由彼陀羅尼威神力故降諸魔眾。
translated: By the majestic power of that dhāraṇī, it subdues the army of demons.
Lotus flowers will emerge in the middle of the four-way crossroads.

original: 若不因彼陀羅尼威德力者不成正覺。
analyzed: 若不因彼陀羅尼威德力者不成正覺。
translated: If it were not for the power of the dhāraṇī's majestic virtue, one would not attain perfect enlightenment.
One would not be able to subdue the multitudes of koṭis of māras.

original: 不能枯竭煩惱大海然大法炬。
analyzed: 不能枯竭煩惱大海然大法炬。
translated: One would not be able to dry up the great ocean of afflictions and light the great Dharma torch.

original: 我於無量拘胝百千劫來。
analyzed: 我於無量拘胝百千劫來。
translated: For countless koṭis of hundreds of thousands of eons,
although I have practiced difficult austerities,
I still have not been able to attain the fruit of enlightenment.

original: 爾時聞彼陀羅尼故方成正覺。
analyzed: 爾時聞彼陀羅尼故方成正覺。
translated: Only when I heard that dhāraṇī did I attain perfect enlightenment.

original: 彼陀羅尼有大威力有大殊勝是真實法。
analyzed: 彼陀羅尼有大威力有大殊勝是真實法。
translated: That dhāraṇī has great power and great distinction, it is the true Dharma.
Among the tathāgatas who have accomplished the Dharma body,
if one is able to chant the name of that mantra,

original: 則為已稱十方諸佛如來名號。
analyzed: 則為已稱十方諸佛如來名號。
translated: it will be as if one has chanted the names of the tathāgatas of the ten directions.
If one is able to read, recite, and uphold it,

original: 則為供養禮拜十方諸佛如來。
analyzed: 則為供養禮拜十方諸佛如來。
translated: it will be as if one has made offerings and paid homage to the tathāgatas of the ten directions.

original: 爾時執金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時執金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva

original: 以種種花種種香塗香粖香供養於佛。
analyzed: 以種種花種種香塗香粖香供養於佛。
translated: made offerings to the Buddha with various flowers, various incense, fragrant ointments, and powdered incense.
Having made offerings, he circumambulated three times to the right.
bowed their heads to the Buddha's feet and said to the Buddha:

original: 世尊此陀羅尼有大威力有大殊勝。
analyzed: 世尊此陀羅尼有大威力有大殊勝。
translated: World-Honored One, this dhāraṇī has great power and great distinction.

original: 唯願世尊普為世界一切有情。
analyzed: 唯願世尊普為世界一切有情。
translated: May the World-Honored One universally for the sake of all sentient beings in the world,

original: 不應以下劣法有所饒益。
analyzed: 不應以下劣法有所饒益。
translated: should not benefit them with inferior dharmas,
but should benefit them with superior dharmas.

original: 何以故此陀羅尼如佛真身故。
analyzed: 何以故此陀羅尼如佛真身故。
translated: Why is it so? Because this dhāraṇī is like the Buddha's true body.

original: 爾時世尊告執金剛菩薩言。
analyzed: 爾時世尊告執金剛菩薩言。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One told Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva:
Sentient beings are inferior, not diligent in their practice,
have many delusions, are foolish and dull,
indulge in desires, do not believe in the true Dharma,
do not respect their fathers, do not respect their mothers,

original: 不敬沙門不敬婆羅門不敬尊者。
analyzed: 不敬沙門不敬婆羅門不敬尊者。
translated: do not respect śramaṇas, do not respect brāhmans, do not respect elders.
Because of this, they are unable to obtain this dhāraṇī.
Having little merit and virtue, and narrow wisdom,
such sentient beings are unable to hear it,
unable to uphold it, and unable to give rise to respect.
This dhāraṇī
can eliminate all offenses.
This is the secret treasury of all Tathāgatas.

original: 爾時世尊告執金剛手大藥叉將曰。
analyzed: 爾時世尊告執金剛手大藥叉將曰。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One said to Vajrapāṇi, the great yakṣa general:

original: 善男子我今欲往東方過無量恒河沙數拘胝那庾他佛世界。
analyzed: 善男子我今欲往東方過無量恒河沙數拘胝那庾他佛世界。
translated: Good man, I now wish to go to the east, beyond buddha worlds as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, koṭis and nayutas in number.
There is a world called Ratnapradīpa.
There is a great city adorned with the seven treasures.
The city is four yojanas wide on each side.
It is peaceful and prosperous, with many people.

original: 彼諸男子及諸女人童子童女。
analyzed: 彼諸男子及諸女人童子童女。
translated: The men, women, boys, and girls there
are all adorned with jeweled ornaments.
Supreme jeweled crowns appear by themselves.
Their appearance is upright and dignified, with great spiritual power.
They have accomplished diligence and penetrating wisdom.
In the city there is a king named Ratnārcis.

original: 有八十拘胝大臣輔佐圍繞。
analyzed: 有八十拘胝大臣輔佐圍繞。
translated: He is surrounded by eighty koṭis of ministers and aides.
The king's chief consort is named Prabhāvatī.
She has two hundred thousand palace ladies.
They are all like celestial maidens, attending on her in front and behind.
The flowers, fruits,
and fragrant trees that grow in that world are all made of the seven treasures.

original: 水生諸華皆是雜寶陸生諸華皆是黃金。
analyzed: 水生諸華皆是雜寶陸生諸華皆是黃金。
translated: The water-born flowers are all made of various treasures, and the land-born flowers are all made of gold.

original: 國人壽命八十萬拘胝歲。
analyzed: 國人壽命八十萬拘胝歲。
translated: The lifespan of the people in that country is 800,000 koṭis of years.

original: 成就十善於佛法僧發大清信。
analyzed: 成就十善於佛法僧發大清信。
translated: They accomplish the ten wholesome [paths of action] and give rise to great pure faith in the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha.

original: 彼王善法化世利益眾生。
analyzed: 彼王善法化世利益眾生。
translated: That king rules the world with good Dharma and benefits sentient beings.
There is a Buddha in that world.

original: 名妙種種色寶善住清淨如來應正等覺。
analyzed: 名妙種種色寶善住清淨如來應正等覺。
translated: His name is the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One of the Well-Abiding Pure Realm of Wonderful Various Colors and Treasures.
He extensively performs the Buddha's work in that world.

original: 與無量菩薩摩訶薩眾及無量拘胝仙人前後圍繞。
analyzed: 與無量菩薩摩訶薩眾及無量拘胝仙人前後圍繞。
translated: He is surrounded in front and back by an assembly of innumerable Bodhisattva-Mahāsattvas and innumerable koṭis of sages.
The body of that Tathāgata is purple-golden in color.

original: 具三十二相八十隨形好。
analyzed: 具三十二相八十隨形好。
translated: He is endowed with the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks.
His halo is one fathom in diameter and its radiance is brilliant.
The bodies of the Bodhisattvas are all purple-golden in color.

original: 相好端嚴辯才無礙坐寶華臺。
analyzed: 相好端嚴辯才無礙坐寶華臺。
translated: They are adorned with excellent characteristics and have unobstructed eloquence. They sit on jeweled lotus pedestals.

original: 常念廣大寶樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼名。
analyzed: 常念廣大寶樓閣善住祕密陀羅尼名。
translated: Always remember the name of the vast and great jeweled pavilion, the secret dhāraṇī of good abiding.
By the majestic power of that dhāraṇī,
One attains such excellent and distinguished merits.
That Buddha, the World-Honored One, for the sake of all sentient beings,
Expounded this dhāraṇī method.

original: 彼諸眾生由聞此陀羅尼故。
analyzed: 彼諸眾生由聞此陀羅尼故。
translated: Because those sentient beings heard this dhāraṇī,
They always obtained peace and happiness.

original: 離諸地獄餓鬼畜生阿素羅道。
analyzed: 離諸地獄餓鬼畜生阿素羅道。
translated: They were separated from the paths of the hells, hungry ghosts, animals, and asuras.

original: 諸惡趣門悉皆關閉開淨天路。
analyzed: 諸惡趣門悉皆關閉開淨天路。
translated: The doors to all evil destinies were completely closed, and the path to the pure heavens was opened.

original: 彼諸眾生皆發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
analyzed: 彼諸眾生皆發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心。
translated: Those sentient beings all gave rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 住大慈悲無諸怨敵如水乳合。
analyzed: 住大慈悲無諸怨敵如水乳合。
translated: Abiding in great compassion, they had no enemies, like water and milk mixed together.

original: 彼佛世尊往昔久遠行菩薩道時。
analyzed: 彼佛世尊往昔久遠行菩薩道時。
translated: When that Buddha, the World-Honored One, was practicing the bodhisattva path in the distant past,

original: 修此陀羅尼法作如是願。
analyzed: 修此陀羅尼法作如是願。
translated: He cultivated this dhāraṇī method and made this vow:
May all sentient beings who are born in my land

original: 悉皆決定得不退轉無上正覺。
analyzed: 悉皆決定得不退轉無上正覺。
translated: All definitely attain irreversibility and supreme perfect enlightenment.
If there are sentient beings who hear this dhāraṇī,
Uphold, recite, diligently cultivate,
Remember and not abandon, even hearing the name,

original: 或復手觸或著身上或眼視見。
analyzed: 或復手觸或著身上或眼視見。
translated: Or touching with the hand, wearing on the body, or seeing with the eyes,
Or writing on silk or paper, or writing on walls,
All sentient beings who see it,
The five heinous crimes, the four grave offenses, slandering the true Dharma,

original: 誹謗聖人屠兒魁膾。🔽盲者聾者瞎者瘻者。
analyzed: 誹謗聖人屠兒魁膾。 盲者聾者瞎者瘻者。
translated: Slandering sages, butchers, executioners,🔽The blind, the deaf, the one-eyed, the crippled,

original: 瘂者癩者癰者貧窮下劣。
analyzed: 瘂者癩者癰者貧窮下劣。
translated: The mute, the leprous, the poor and lowly,
Those with uncertain karma, those bound by the net of Mara,

original: 墮邪見者毘那夜迦觸者。
analyzed: 墮邪見者毘那夜迦觸者。
translated: Those who have fallen into wrong views, those touched by Vinayaka,
Those harmed by evil stars, those harmed by the seven luminaries,

original: 彼等諸人聞此陀羅尼名。
analyzed: 彼等諸人聞此陀羅尼名。
translated: Those people who hear the name of this dharani,
Will definitely attain supreme perfect enlightenment,
Or those who have taken on the body of an animal,
Deer, birds, mosquitoes, gadflies, moths, ants,

original: 胎生化生濕生種種蟲等。
analyzed: 胎生化生濕生種種蟲等。
translated: Those born from wombs, born from transformation, born from moisture, various insects,

original: 彼諸眾生聞此陀羅尼名者。
analyzed: 彼諸眾生聞此陀羅尼名者。
translated: Those sentient beings who hear the name of this dharani,

original: 必當決定證得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提無諸疑惑。
analyzed: 必當決定證得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提無諸疑惑。
translated: Will definitely and without doubt attain supreme perfect enlightenment.
At that time, when the World-Honored One had finished speaking,

original: 一切大眾皆大歡喜身毛聳竪。
analyzed: 一切大眾皆大歡喜身毛聳竪。
translated: The entire great assembly was overjoyed and their body hairs stood on end.

original: 是時天雨波頭摩華俱牟頭華。
analyzed: 是時天雨波頭摩華俱牟頭華。
translated: At that time, heavenly rain fell, with pāṭala flowers, kumuda flowers,
utpala flowers, and mandāra flowers.

original: 於虛空中有諸種種微妙天樂自然鼓作。
analyzed: 於虛空中有諸種種微妙天樂自然鼓作。
translated: In the sky, various kinds of subtle heavenly music spontaneously sounded.

original: 時會大眾各各皆見身有光明。
analyzed: 時會大眾各各皆見身有光明。
translated: At that time, the great assembly each saw their bodies emit light.

original: 於如來前自然涌出七寶妙幢。
analyzed: 於如來前自然涌出七寶妙幢。
translated: In front of the Tathāgata, seven precious, wondrous banners spontaneously emerged.
They were upright, beautiful, and pleasing to behold.

original: 幢有四柱四門及四堦道光明赫奕。
analyzed: 幢有四柱四門及四堦道光明赫奕。
translated: The banners had four pillars, four gates, and four stairways, their light shining brightly.
On the four sides of the banners, there were large treasures.

original: 其光如日普耀世界。🔽復有無量寶珠綴於羅網。
analyzed: 其光如日普耀世界。 復有無量寶珠綴於羅網。
translated: Their light was like the sun, illuminating the world.🔽Furthermore, countless precious jewels were strung together in nets.
Countless precious bells were suspended above them.
Fresh and colorful silks were used as banners and canopies.
Many wonderful flowers were interspersed to adorn it.
At that time, the great earth shook in six ways,

original: 所謂動搖吼震踴沒之相。
analyzed: 所謂動搖吼震踴沒之相。
translated: Namely, moving, shaking, roaring, trembling, rising, and sinking.
The celestial palaces were all illuminated.
Wherever the light reached, everyone was awakened.

original: 四天王天明仙天等亦復如是。
analyzed: 四天王天明仙天等亦復如是。
translated: The Four Heavenly Kings, the celestial immortals, and others were also like this.

original: 一切魔宮忽然光明皆大怖懼。
analyzed: 一切魔宮忽然光明皆大怖懼。
translated: All the demon palaces suddenly became bright, and everyone was greatly frightened.
The piśācas were terrified and ran away.
They went beyond the boundaries, seeking pity and protection.

original: 爾時世尊於兩肩間現大白毫。
analyzed: 爾時世尊於兩肩間現大白毫。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One manifested a great white tuft between his shoulders.

original: 其光普遍一切世界一切佛土。
analyzed: 其光普遍一切世界一切佛土。
translated: Its light pervaded all worlds and all buddha-lands.
Those tathāgatas who saw this light
Immediately understood and spoke the meaning of the dhāraṇī.
After the light arrived, it gradually retracted.

original: 於釋迦如來頂上遶旋如沒。
analyzed: 於釋迦如來頂上遶旋如沒。
translated: It circled above Śākyamuni's head and then disappeared.
The tathāgatas of the ten directions

original: 咸皆同聲讚歎釋迦牟尼如來言。
analyzed: 咸皆同聲讚歎釋迦牟尼如來言。
translated: All praised Śākyamuni Tathāgata with the same voice, saying:
Excellent, Śākyamuni Tathāgata!

original: 汝今應往寶燈世界妙種種色寶善住清淨如來所。
analyzed: 汝今應往寶燈世界妙種種色寶善住清淨如來所。
translated: You should now go to the world of Ratnapradīpa, to the Tathāgata Ratnākara of various wondrous colors,

analyzed: 爾時眾中有金剛手菩薩摩訶薩。

He bowed his head to Śākyamuni Tathāgata.
With palms joined in respect, he addressed the Buddha, saying, World-Honored One,
The Tathāgatas in this stūpa,
Where did they come from? Where did they come from?

original: 佛言汝今諦聽當為汝說。
analyzed: 佛言汝今諦聽當為汝說。
translated: The Buddha said, Listen carefully now, I will explain it to you.

original: 乃往古昔不可思議無量無數阿僧祇劫。
analyzed: 乃往古昔不可思議無量無數阿僧祇劫。
translated: In the distant past, an inconceivable, immeasurable, and countless number of asaṃkhyeya kalpas ago,

original: 此贍部洲中多諸人眾安隱豐樂。
analyzed: 此贍部洲中多諸人眾安隱豐樂。
translated: In this Jambudvīpa, there were many people who were peaceful, secure, and prosperous.
The five grains grew without being planted and ripened naturally.
People had no sense of self or other and did not hoard.
At that time, there was no name of Buddha.
There was a great mountain called the King of Jewel Mountains.
In that Jewel Mountain, there were three sages.

original: 一名寶髻二名金髻三名金剛髻。
analyzed: 一名寶髻二名金髻三名金剛髻。
translated: One was named Ratnacūḍa, the second was named Suvarṇacūḍa, and the third was named Vajracūḍa.

original: 彼三仙人繫心專念佛法僧寶。
analyzed: 彼三仙人繫心專念佛法僧寶。
translated: Those three sages focused their minds on the Three Jewels of the Buddha, Dharma, and Saṃgha.
They also thought like this:
When will we attain supreme perfect enlightenment?
And liberate all sentient beings?
At that time, the assembly of sages, having had this thought,
remained silent for a while and then gave rise to the previous thought again.

original: 由是念故即證慈悲歡喜一切眾生種種樓閣三摩地。
analyzed: 由是念故即證慈悲歡喜一切眾生種種樓閣三摩地。
translated: Because of this thought, they immediately attained the samadhi of compassion, joy, and various towers for all sentient beings.

original: 獲於天眼觀彼上方見淨居天。
analyzed: 獲於天眼觀彼上方見淨居天。
translated: They attained the heavenly eye and observed the Pure Abode Heaven above.
Then, there was a voice in the sky that said,
Excellent, right person! Excellent, right person!
You are able to give rise to the supreme vow and seek the great right enlightenment.
Have you heard of it or not?

original: 有大妙法名廣大寶樓閣祕密善住陀羅尼。
analyzed: 有大妙法名廣大寶樓閣祕密善住陀羅尼。
translated: There is a great and wonderful Dharma called the secret well-abiding dharani of the vast jeweled tower.
In the past, the Tathagata has already expounded it.
It is well for the benefit of all sentient beings.

original: 諸有聞者決定不退無上正覺。
analyzed: 諸有聞者決定不退無上正覺。
translated: Those who hear it will definitely not regress from supreme perfect enlightenment.
All the Buddha Dharmas will quickly appear before them.
All samadhis will also appear before them.

original: 一切陀羅尼法門亦當現前。
analyzed: 一切陀羅尼法門亦當現前。
translated: All dharani Dharma gates will also appear before them.
And be able to subdue all māra armies.

original: 然大法炬一切善種當得現前。
analyzed: 然大法炬一切善種當得現前。
translated: Then the great Dharma torch and all wholesome seeds will be manifested.
Accomplish the six perfections.

original: 一切地獄餓鬼傍生閻摩羅界阿素羅眾。
analyzed: 一切地獄餓鬼傍生閻摩羅界阿素羅眾。
translated: All hell beings, hungry ghosts, animals, Yama realm beings, and asura multitudes,
Those who hear this mantra will all be liberated.

original: 生老病死憂悲苦惱永得超越。
analyzed: 生老病死憂悲苦惱永得超越。
translated: Birth, old age, sickness, death, sorrow, suffering, and distress will be forever transcended.
In the future, in this Jambudvīpa,

original: 眾生有於父母不孝順者。
analyzed: 眾生有於父母不孝順者。
translated: There will be sentient beings who are unfilial to their parents,

original: 不敬沙門者不敬婆羅門者不敬耆舊者。

translated: Slander the buddhas, slander the bodhisattvas,

analyzed: 殺阿羅漢者造五逆罪者。
translated: Kill arhats, commit the five heinous crimes,

analyzed: 一切魔軍皆得調伏。 一切眾生見者歡喜。
translated: All demonic armies will be subdued.🔽All beings who see them will rejoice.
All beings will revere and respect them.

original: 國王大臣及諸眷屬見者歡喜。
analyzed: 國王大臣及諸眷屬見者歡喜。
translated: The kings, ministers, and their retinue who see it will rejoice.
The words that come from their mouths will be trusted by all who hear them.
Their hands and feet will be soft and their voices will be harmonious and elegant.
They will be free from poverty and will not suffer worldly hardships.

original: 毒藥刀杖火災等難永相去離。
analyzed: 毒藥刀杖火災等難永相去離。
translated: They will be forever separated from the difficulties of poisonous medicines, swords, staffs, and fires.

original: 師子虎狼諸惡禽獸不能為害。
analyzed: 師子虎狼諸惡禽獸不能為害。
translated: Lions, tigers, wolves, and other vicious animals will not be able to harm them.

no danger of executioners, no danger of rākṣasas,
no danger of evil ghosts, no danger of evil spirits,
no danger of poisonous snakes, and no danger of epidemics.

analyzed: 一切諸佛當來現前安慰其人。
translated: All buddhas will come and comfort that person.

translated: Whether sleeping, waking, walking, standing, sitting, or lying down, one always attains peace and joy. In dreams, one sees hundreds of thousands of myriads of worlds, buddha-lands, and buddhas, with bodhisattvas surrounding them.

original: 此陀羅尼有如是等無量無邊不可思議力。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼有如是等無量無邊不可思議力。
translated: This dhāraṇī has such immeasurable, boundless, inconceivable powers.

original: 時彼仙人得法歡喜欣慶踊躍。
analyzed: 時彼仙人得法歡喜欣慶踊躍。
translated: At that time, the sage attained the Dharma, and with joy and delight, he leaped up.

original: 於其住處如新醍醐消沒於地即於沒處而生三竹。
analyzed: 於其住處如新醍醐消沒於地即於沒處而生三竹。
translated: At his dwelling place, like fresh ghee, he dissolved into the ground. At the place where he dissolved, three bamboos grew.
The roots were made of the seven treasures, the stems were golden, and the leaves and stalks were made of jewels.
On the branches and twigs, there were pearls.
The fragrance was exceptionally pure, and there was always light.
Those who came to see it were all delighted.
After ten months had passed, it split open by itself.
Inside each bamboo grew a child.
Their appearance was upright and their physical characteristics were perfect.
When the three children were born,
they each sat cross-legged under the bamboo.
On the seventh day,
they all attained perfect enlightenment during the night.

original: 其身金色三十二相八十種好圓光嚴飾。
analyzed: 其身金色三十二相八十種好圓光嚴飾。
translated: Their bodies were golden in color, with the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks, and they were adorned with halos.

original: 時彼三竹一一變成高妙樓閣。
analyzed: 時彼三竹一一變成高妙樓閣。
translated: At that time, the three bamboos each transformed into a lofty and marvelous pavilion.

original: 爾時便有廣大寶祕密善住陀羅尼呪於虛空中以金書字。
analyzed: 爾時便有廣大寶祕密善住陀羅尼呪於虛空中以金書字。
translated: Then, there was the vast secret dhāraṇī mantra of the well-abiding jewel in the sky, written in gold letters.

original: 忽然而現四大天王。🔽所謂寶髻龍主天王。
analyzed: 忽然而現四大天王。 所謂寶髻龍主天王。
translated: It suddenly appeared, and the Four Heavenly Kings🔽namely, the Heavenly King of the Dragon King of Jeweled Topknot,
the Heavenly King of the Kumbhāṇḍa King of Jeweled Treasury,
the Heavenly King of the Mahoraga King of Wonderful Pearl Light,
each held jeweled canopies to cover them above.
Pure celestial beings scattered various wonderful jewels.

original: 金剛藥叉主天王與無量百千眷屬執持妙華。
analyzed: 金剛藥叉主天王與無量百千眷屬執持妙華。
translated: The Heavenly King of the Vajra Yakṣa, together with innumerable hundreds of thousands of retinue, held wonderful flowers,
and made offerings to them, saying:
Now the World-Honored Buddha has appeared in the treasure store.

original: 爾時世尊告執金剛菩薩摩訶薩。
analyzed: 爾時世尊告執金剛菩薩摩訶薩。
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One said to Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva Mahāsattva:
Are the three sages of the past different people?

original: 今此寶幢塔中三全身如來。
analyzed: 今此寶幢塔中三全身如來。
translated: Now, in this Jeweled Banner Pagoda, there are the three whole-body Tathāgatas.

original: 是彼時三竹者今妙樓閣寶幢是。
analyzed: 是彼時三竹者今妙樓閣寶幢是。
translated: Those three bamboos of that time are now the wonderful pavilion and jeweled banner.
That ground of that time is now this ground.

original: 彼時世界者今此世界是。
analyzed: 彼時世界者今此世界是。
translated: That world of that time is now this world.

original: 彼時仙人由聞此陀羅尼勤修習故。
analyzed: 彼時仙人由聞此陀羅尼勤修習故。
translated: At that time, the sages diligently practiced this dhāraṇī after hearing it.
They abandoned their sage bodies and attained perfect enlightenment.
The Pure Abode god in the sky of the past,
is he a different person? It is my body.
In the past, there was a virtuous one named Pure Abode.
He always diligently made offerings to those three sages.

original: 其淨居者今妙種種色清淨如來是。
analyzed: 其淨居者今妙種種色清淨如來是。
translated: That Pure Abode is now the Tathāgata of Wonderful Various Colors and Purity.
In the past, after those three sages attained perfect enlightenment,
they gave a prophecy to that Pure Abode, saying:
You will attain Buddhahood in the future.
You will be called the Tathagata of Wonderful Various Colors and Purity.
At that time, the Buddhas from the ten directions who had come together
all praised Shakyamuni Tathagata, saying,

original: 善哉善哉能以如來境界善加護故。
analyzed: 善哉善哉能以如來境界善加護故。
translated: Excellent, excellent! You are able to skillfully protect the realm of the Tathagata.
You have spoken of this past cause and condition,

original: 示現如是祕密陀羅尼。🔽是諸如來祕密之母。
analyzed: 示現如是祕密陀羅尼。 是諸如來祕密之母。
translated: revealing this kind of secret dharani.🔽This is the secret mother of all Tathagatas.
This is the secret heart of all Tathagatas.
This is the vajra seat of all Tathagatas.
This is the secret spiritual transformation of all Tathagatas.

original: 是諸如來成就祕密六波羅蜜。
analyzed: 是諸如來成就祕密六波羅蜜。
translated: This is the accomplishment of the secret six paramitas of all Tathagatas.

original: 是諸如來般若波羅蜜。🔽是諸如來祕密壇場。
analyzed: 是諸如來般若波羅蜜。 是諸如來祕密壇場。
translated: This is the prajna paramita of all Tathagatas.🔽This is the secret altar of all Tathagatas.
This is the secret seal of all Tathagatas.

original: 是諸如來祕密放百千萬光。
analyzed: 是諸如來祕密放百千萬光。
translated: This is the secret emission of hundreds of thousands of myriads of lights by all Tathagatas.

original: 是諸如來祕密實相之藏。
analyzed: 是諸如來祕密實相之藏。
translated: This is the secret treasury of the true characteristics of all Tathagatas.

original: 是諸如來祕密三摩地加護神變。
analyzed: 是諸如來祕密三摩地加護神變。
translated: This is the secret samadhi empowerment of the Tathagatas.

original: 是諸菩薩祕密莊嚴菩提心。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩祕密莊嚴菩提心。
translated: This is the secret adornment of the bodhicitta of the Bodhisattvas.
This is the secret Buddha ground of the Bodhisattvas.

original: 是諸菩薩入祕密三摩地。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩入祕密三摩地。
translated: This is the secret samadhi entry of the Bodhisattvas.

original: 此陀羅尼能除一切業障。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼能除一切業障。
translated: This dharani can eliminate all karmic hindrances.

At that time, Shakyamuni Tathagata

original: 住正念智觀察一切如來。
analyzed: 住正念智觀察一切如來。
translated: Abided in right mindfulness and wisdom, observing all Tathagatas.

analyzed: 復放百千萬拘胝那庾他光明。
translated: He again emitted hundreds of thousands of kotis of nayutas of light,

analyzed: 所謂青黃赤白紅紫雜色。
translated: Namely blue, yellow, red, white, crimson, and variegated colors.
Universally illuminating the Buddha-lands of the ten directions.
The light pervading there and returning to the Buddha.
Circling to the right three times and disappearing into the Buddha's crown.
When the light had disappeared,
At that time, the World-Honored Buddha, with his pure Brahma voice,

original: 於大眾中說此陀羅尼呪曰。
analyzed: 於大眾中說此陀羅尼呪曰。
translated: Spoke this dharani mantra in the great assembly:

original: 唵一薩婆呾他伽上呼下同多二摩尼捨多三儞畢低四社縛羅社縛上呼下同羅五達摩駄睹碣里鞞六摩尼摩尼七摩訶怛他伽多纈里摩尼八莎訶九說此陀羅尼大明呪王。

The tathāgatas of the ten directions praised in unison,
Excellent, excellent! Śākyamuni Tathāgata,

original: 善說此陀羅尼大明神呪。
analyzed: 善說此陀羅尼大明神呪。
translated: You have well expounded this great dhāraṇī and bright divine mantra.

original: 於虛空中現贍部金雲遍覆十方。
analyzed: 於虛空中現贍部金雲遍覆十方。
translated: In the empty sky, Jambūnada gold clouds covered the ten directions,
And from those clouds rained down seven treasures.

original: 雜以牛頭栴檀上妙粖香充滿世界。
analyzed: 雜以牛頭栴檀上妙粖香充滿世界。
translated: Mixed with the finest sandalwood powder, filling the world with fragrance.

original: 復雨優曇鉢花而以供養。
analyzed: 復雨優曇鉢花而以供養。
translated: It also rained udumbara flowers as offerings.

original: 次雨俱牟頭花芬陀利花蘇乾陀花。
analyzed: 次雨俱牟頭花芬陀利花蘇乾陀花。
translated: Next, it rained kumuda flowers, pundarīka flowers, sukeśara flowers,

analyzed: 曼陀羅花摩訶曼陀羅花。
translated: Mandāra flowers, mahāmandāra flowers,
Rocana flowers, great rocana flowers.
Mandarava flowers, great mandarava flowers.
Sumanas flowers, pavaritta flowers.

original: 栴檀華瞻蔔華而供養佛。
analyzed: 栴檀華瞻蔔華而供養佛。
translated: Sandal flowers, campaka flowers, to make offerings to the Buddha.
The palaces of all demons were ablaze with fire.
All the demon hordes were terrified.

original: 一切毘那夜迦身皆流汗臭穢奔走十方。
analyzed: 一切毘那夜迦身皆流汗臭穢奔走十方。
translated: The bodies of all the Vinayakas were covered in foul-smelling sweat, and they fled in all directions.

original: 所有淨信天龍藥叉乾闥婆阿素羅緊那羅摩睺羅人非人等。
analyzed: 所有淨信天龍藥叉乾闥婆阿素羅緊那羅摩睺羅人非人等。
translated: The pure-minded devas, nagas, yakshas, gandharvas, asuras, kinnaras, mahoragas, humans, and non-humans,
each holding offering implements, made offerings to the Tathagata.
There was also the Bodhisattva Manigarbha,

original: 與無量百千萬億俱胝菩薩。
analyzed: 與無量百千萬億俱胝菩薩。
translated: together with countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of kotis of nayutas of bodhisattvas.

original: 悉持種種妙寶而供養佛。
analyzed: 悉持種種妙寶而供養佛。
translated: They all held various wonderful jewels to make offerings to the Buddha.
There was also the Bodhisattva Vajrapani,

original: 與無量百千萬億俱胝明仙。
analyzed: 與無量百千萬億俱胝明仙。
translated: together with countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of kotis of vidyadharas.

original: 復以種種百千天衣而供養佛。
analyzed: 復以種種百千天衣而供養佛。
translated: They also used various hundreds of thousands of heavenly garments to make offerings to the Buddha.
There were also the Four Heavenly Kings,

original: 與無量百千萬億四天王眾。
analyzed: 與無量百千萬億四天王眾。
translated: and innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of the four heavenly kings,

original: 以種種香華塗香粖香華鬘衣服旛蓋而供養佛。
analyzed: 以種種香華塗香粖香華鬘衣服旛蓋而供養佛。
translated: with various incense, flowers, ointments, powdered incense, flower garlands, clothing, banners, and canopies to make offerings to the Buddha.

original: 復有梵天與梵眾諸天而來供養。
analyzed: 復有梵天與梵眾諸天而來供養。
translated: There were also Brahmā gods who came with the Brahmā assembly gods to make offerings.

original: 復有三十三天與百千萬億天子供養於佛。
analyzed: 復有三十三天與百千萬億天子供養於佛。
translated: There were also the thirty-three celestials who, with hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of gods, made offerings to the Buddha.

original: 如是那羅延大自在天賢摩尼天賢滿力天等同來供養。
analyzed: 如是那羅延大自在天賢摩尼天賢滿力天等同來供養。
translated: In this way, Nārāyaṇa, Maheśvara, Maṇi, and Pūrṇabhadra, all came together to make offerings.

original: 復有日月天子在於空中而供養佛。
analyzed: 復有日月天子在於空中而供養佛。
translated: There were also the sun and moon celestial sons who, in the sky, made offerings to the Buddha.
There were also the celestial maidens Śrī, Sarasvatī,
Hārītī, Vimalā,
Vajra-Kāla, Puṣpa-Dantī,
and messengers, hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis,

original: 各各以天嚴具供養於佛。
analyzed: 各各以天嚴具供養於佛。
translated: each using celestial adornments to make offerings to the Buddha.
There was also the ghost mother goddess,
together with hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of yakṣa maidens,
surrounding her in front and back to make offerings to the Buddha.
There were also innumerable gandharva assemblies.
They made offerings to the Buddha with heavenly music.

original: 復有無量百千龍王集會。
analyzed: 復有無量百千龍王集會。
translated: There were also innumerable hundreds of thousands of nāga kings assembled.

original: 所謂娑竭羅龍王難陀龍王。
analyzed: 所謂娑竭羅龍王難陀龍王。
translated: Namely, the nāga kings Sāgara, Nanda,

original: 優鉢難陀龍王。🔽婆魯拏龍王善住龍王。
analyzed: 優鉢難陀龍王。 婆魯拏龍王善住龍王。
translated: Upananda,🔽Varuṇa, Subhadra,
Ratnacūḍa, and Rūpavarṇa.
They made offerings to the Buddha with various wonderful jewels.

original: 復有轉輪王與無量百千萬億大臣宮人婇女前後圍繞。
analyzed: 復有轉輪王與無量百千萬億大臣宮人婇女前後圍繞。
translated: There were also wheel-turning kings surrounded in front and back by innumerable hundreds of thousands of myriads of ministers, palace ladies, and concubines.
At that time, the earth transformed into vajra.

original: 於如來前從地湧出七寶蓮華。
analyzed: 於如來前從地湧出七寶蓮華。
translated: From the ground in front of the Tathāgata, seven-jeweled lotus flowers emerged.
The flowers had a thousand petals.

original: 於其華中有贍部金千輻寶輪。
analyzed: 於其華中有贍部金千輻寶輪。
translated: In the center of the flowers was a Jambūnada gold wheel with a thousand spokes.
Its radiance was brilliant, shining like the sun.

original: 其光遍覆三千大千世界。
analyzed: 其光遍覆三千大千世界。
translated: Its light completely covered the trichiliocosm.

original: 於輪臍中出微妙聲作如是言。
analyzed: 於輪臍中出微妙聲作如是言。
translated: From the center of the wheel emerged a subtle voice saying thus:

original: 善哉善哉釋迦牟尼如來。
analyzed: 善哉善哉釋迦牟尼如來。
translated: Excellent, excellent! Śākyamuni Tathāgata!
You are able to expound such secret dhāraṇīs.
This dhāraṇī mantra
is able to turn the unsurpassed, greatest Dharma wheel.
It is able to enter the site of enlightenment.
It is the secret mind of all tathāgatas.
It is the true treasure of all tathāgatas.

original: 唯願世尊復更為說廣大善住祕密樓閣陀羅尼心要之法。
analyzed: 唯願世尊復更為說廣大善住祕密樓閣陀羅尼心要之法。
translated: May the World-Honored One please further expound the essential method of the secret palace of vast and good abiding, the heart of the dhāraṇī,

original: 令一切大眾咸皆覺悟無上菩提。
analyzed: 令一切大眾咸皆覺悟無上菩提。
translated: causing all the great assembly to awaken to the unsurpassed enlightenment.
This is the fundamental.
Now is the right time.
Please explain quickly.

original: 此呪能除一切惡道業障。
analyzed: 此呪能除一切惡道業障。
translated: This mantra is able to eliminate all evil karmic hindrances.
It is able to dry up the bitter sea of all blood and tears.
It is able to deliver all from the wilderness of birth and death.
It is able to transcend the turbulent waves of all afflictions.

original: 若不遇此陀羅尼大明呪王。
analyzed: 若不遇此陀羅尼大明呪王。
translated: If one does not encounter this great bright mantra king of dhāraṇīs,
one will ultimately be unable to accomplish the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment.

original: 此陀羅尼是諸佛種。🔽是大法輪是大法炬。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼是諸佛種。 是大法輪是大法炬。
translated: This dhāraṇī is the seed of all buddhas.🔽It is the great Dharma wheel, the great Dharma torch.
It is the great Dharma banner, the great Dharma conch,
It is the great Dharma drum, the vajra seat.

original: 唯願世尊廣為眾說此大陀羅尼王曼荼羅印法㡧法。
analyzed: 唯願世尊廣為眾說此大陀羅尼王曼荼羅印法㡧法。
translated: May the World-Honored One extensively explain for the assembly the great dhāraṇī king, the maṇḍala, the mudrā method, and the painting method.

original: 今此會中天龍藥叉乾闥婆迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅人非人等。
analyzed: 今此會中天龍藥叉乾闥婆迦樓羅緊那羅摩睺羅人非人等。
translated: In this assembly, devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, humans, non-humans, and others,
All look up in admiration, wishing to hear the essential Dharma.
At that time, the World-Honored One, having heard these words,

original: 即為大眾廣說陀羅尼祕要之法。
analyzed: 即為大眾廣說陀羅尼祕要之法。
translated: Expounded for the great assembly the secret essential Dharma of the dhāraṇī.

original: 2 根本咒品根本呪品第二爾時世尊為諸大眾。
analyzed: 2 根本咒品根本呪品第二爾時世尊為諸大眾。
translated: Chapter 2: The Root Mantras, Part Two At that time, the World-Honored One, for the sake of the great assembly,
Expounded this dhāraṇī king.
This mantra can accomplish unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: 能除一切罪業身得清淨。
analyzed: 能除一切罪業身得清淨。
translated: It can eliminate all evil karma and purify the body.
He then spoke the mantra, saying:

original: 那慕薩婆怛他揭多去南去一唵二肥布羅孽鞞三摩尼去鉢臘二合鞞四怛他上多去那捺儞舍泥五摩尼摩尼六蘇鉢臘鞞七肥摩麗八娑孽囉鉗鼻去囇九吽吽十什皤羅什皤羅二合十一勃陀嚩𡀔枳羝十二麌醯夜二合地瑟恥二合多孽鞞十三莎訶十四爾時世尊說此廣大寶善住祕密樓閣陀羅尼已。
analyzed: 那慕薩婆怛他揭多去南去一唵二肥布羅孽鞞三摩尼去鉢臘二合鞞四怛他上多去那捺儞舍泥五摩尼摩尼六蘇鉢臘鞞七肥摩麗八娑孽囉鉗鼻去囇九吽吽十什皤羅什皤羅二合十一勃陀嚩𡀔枳羝十二麌醯夜二合地瑟恥二合多孽鞞十三莎訶十四爾時世尊說此廣大寶善住祕密樓閣陀羅尼已。
translated: Namo sarva tathāgatakāya uttarāṃ oṃ viprāsani māṇi pāraṇi tathāgata nandi śānti māṇi māṇi subhāri viśodhani svāhā. At that time, after the World-Honored One had spoken this vast treasure well-abiding secret palace dhāraṇī,
the great earth shook in six ways.
It rained a great rain of treasures and heavenly wonderful flowers.
The entire great assembly was delighted,
praising what had never been before and realizing irreversibility.

original: 是時十方諸如來等。🔽同聲讚歎釋迦牟尼如來。
analyzed: 是時十方諸如來等。 同聲讚歎釋迦牟尼如來。
translated: At that time, the tathāgatas of the ten directions
all praised Śākyamuni Tathāgata with the same voice, saying, Excellent, Śākyamuni Tathāgata!

original: 乃能說是入菩薩道場陀羅尼。
analyzed: 乃能說是入菩薩道場陀羅尼。
translated: Are able to expound this dhāraṇī for entering the bodhisattva's arena.

original: 大眾聞已一切惡趣皆得消滅。
analyzed: 大眾聞已一切惡趣皆得消滅。
translated: When the great assembly hears it, all evil destinies will be extinguished.
Those who recollect the name of this dhāraṇī

original: 則為以諸微妙香華塗香粖香。
analyzed: 則為以諸微妙香華塗香粖香。
translated: Will have offered subtle and wonderful incense, flowers, ointments, and powdered incense
To all the buddhas in the ten directions.

original: 若能讀誦即得不退轉無上正覺。
analyzed: 若能讀誦即得不退轉無上正覺。
translated: If one is able to read and recite it, one will attain irreversibility from supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 乃至百劫千劫百千萬劫一切如來。
analyzed: 乃至百劫千劫百千萬劫一切如來。
translated: Even for hundreds of eons, thousands of eons, hundreds of thousands of myriads of eons, all tathāgatas
Will not be able to praise and exhaust its merits.
This dhāraṇī has great power and influence.

original: 一切魔王終不能為其障礙。
analyzed: 一切魔王終不能為其障礙。
translated: All māra kings will never be able to create obstacles for it.
All hateful enemies, evil friends, ghosts and spirits,

original: 藥叉羅剎人非人等不能為害。
analyzed: 藥叉羅剎人非人等不能為害。
translated: Yakṣas, rākṣasas, humans, non-humans, etc. will not be able to harm it.
It increases immeasurable blessings and virtues.

original: 若纔念此陀羅尼者獲福如是。
analyzed: 若纔念此陀羅尼者獲福如是。
translated: If one merely recollects this dhāraṇī, one will obtain such blessings.

original: 爾時執金剛手藥叉軍將及四大天王。
analyzed: 爾時執金剛手藥叉軍將及四大天王。
translated: At that time, Vajrapāṇi, the general of the yakṣa army, and the Four Heavenly Kings
Rose from their seats in the assembly.
Respectfully joined palms and bowed their heads to the Buddha's feet.

original: 白言世尊我等常當擁護持此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 白言世尊我等常當擁護持此陀羅尼者。
translated: They said to the World-Honored One, We will always protect those who uphold this dhāraṇī.
At that time, the World-Honored One extended his golden-colored hand,

original: 摩執金剛手菩薩及四大天王頂作是言。
analyzed: 摩執金剛手菩薩及四大天王頂作是言。
translated: rubbed the heads of Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva and the Four Heavenly Kings, and said,

original: 我今以此陀羅尼神呪付囑於汝。
analyzed: 我今以此陀羅尼神呪付囑於汝。
translated: I now entrust this dhāraṇī and divine mantra to you.

original: 若有持此陀羅尼者汝當擁護。
analyzed: 若有持此陀羅尼者汝當擁護。
translated: If there are those who uphold this dhāraṇī, you should protect them.

original: 爾時執金剛手菩薩及四大天王。
analyzed: 爾時執金剛手菩薩及四大天王。
translated: At that time, Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva and the Four Heavenly Kings,

original: 白佛言世尊我等奉如來教。
analyzed: 白佛言世尊我等奉如來教。
translated: said to the Buddha, World-Honored One, we will follow the Tathāgata's teachings.

original: 常護此大陀羅尼法明呪。
analyzed: 常護此大陀羅尼法明呪。
translated: We will always protect this great dhāraṇī and illuminate the mantra.
We will also protect those who uphold it.

original: 3 心隨心咒品心隨心呪品第三爾時世尊為諸大眾。
analyzed: 3 心隨心咒品心隨心呪品第三爾時世尊為諸大眾。
translated: Chapter 3: The Chapter on the Mind-Following Mind Dhāraṇī. At that time, the World-Honored One, for the sake of the great assembly,
recited the dhāraṇī mind mantra, saying:

original: 唵　摩儞　跋社　黎吽爾時世尊復說隨心呪曰。
analyzed: 唵　摩儞　跋社　黎吽爾時世尊復說隨心呪曰。
translated: Oṃ maṇi padme hūṃ. At that time, the World-Honored One again recited the mind-following mantra, saying:

original: 唵　摩儞　達哩吽　鏺吒根本呪者不假簡擇吉祥星宿日齋戒。
analyzed: 唵　摩儞　達哩吽　鏺吒根本呪者不假簡擇吉祥星宿日齋戒。
translated: Oṃ maṇi dhari hūṃ phaṭ The fundamental mantra does not require the selection of an auspicious star or day for fasting.
But recite it until it is complete.
Then, in front of the Buddha or in front of a stūpa containing relics,

original: 於白月十五日潔淨洗浴。
analyzed: 於白月十五日潔淨洗浴。
translated: on the fifteenth day of the bright fortnight, bathe and purify oneself.
Wear fresh, clean clothes and make offerings according to one's ability.
Light four lamps and scatter various incense and flowers.
The one who upholds the mantra should eat the three white foods.
Then recite this mantra eight hundred times.
Then stay overnight in that very place.
When dawn approaches,
the Tathāgata will then manifest his body.

original: 執金剛手菩薩亦現於前。
analyzed: 執金剛手菩薩亦現於前。
translated: Bodhisattva Vajrapāṇi will also appear in front.
All wishes will be fulfilled.

original: 若造五逆罪者作如是法。
analyzed: 若造五逆罪者作如是法。
translated: If one who has committed the five heinous crimes performs this method,

original: 第三遍方得感現勿生疑惑。
analyzed: 第三遍方得感現勿生疑惑。
translated: one will only be able to evoke the manifestation on the third try. Do not give rise to doubt.
Always recite it eight hundred times in the early morning.
All the highest wishes one seeks will be accomplished.

original: 毒不能害水不能漂火不能燒。
analyzed: 毒不能害水不能漂火不能燒。
translated: Poison cannot harm them, water cannot drown them, fire cannot burn them.
Bandits cannot injure them, and illness cannot invade them.
They have no other fears and always have no serious illnesses.
They also have no eye diseases, ear diseases, nose diseases,
tongue diseases, mouth diseases, tooth diseases, lip diseases,

original: 乃至一日病二日病三日病四日病無頭痛。
analyzed: 乃至一日病二日病三日病四日病無頭痛。
translated: up to one-day illnesses, two-day illnesses, three-day illnesses, four-day illnesses, and no headaches.
All evil poisonous snakes, tigers, wolves, and predatory animals
cannot harm them, and they have no evil spirits or difficulties.
The power of this dhāraṇī is like this.

original: 能除一切怖畏能滅一切惡障。
analyzed: 能除一切怖畏能滅一切惡障。
translated: It can remove all fears and destroy all evil obstacles.

original: 能生一切功德能成就六波羅蜜。
analyzed: 能生一切功德能成就六波羅蜜。
translated: It can give rise to all merits and virtues and can accomplish the six pāramitās.
It accomplishes the practices carried out by the Tathāgata.
Those who recite this dhāraṇī

original: 皆能成就一切事業若有人登大高山峯上誦此陀羅尼。
analyzed: 皆能成就一切事業若有人登大高山峯上誦此陀羅尼。
translated: can accomplish all tasks. If a person ascends to the peak of a great mountain and recites this dhāraṇī,
to the limit of what can be seen with the eyes,
all sentient beings will eliminate all sinful karma.
Also, they will be free from all hellish karma.
They will escape all animal bodies.

original: 若入天廟中誦此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 若入天廟中誦此陀羅尼者。
translated: If one enters a temple and recites this dhāraṇī,
It will cause all celestial spirits to obey one's commands.
If one enters a dragon pool and recites this mantra,
All dragon spirits will come and submit to one's protection.
If one recites this mantra in front of the sun,

original: 日天子即當來現其人前。
analyzed: 日天子即當來現其人前。
translated: The sun god will then appear in front of that person.
He will grant all the wishes and intentions that are sought.

original: 若有於執金剛手菩薩前誦此呪者。
analyzed: 若有於執金剛手菩薩前誦此呪者。
translated: If someone recites this mantra in front of Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva,

original: 執金剛手菩薩現於其前。
analyzed: 執金剛手菩薩現於其前。
translated: Vajrapāṇi Bodhisattva will appear in front of them.
The wishes that are sought will also be granted as one wishes.
If a person takes the root of sweet flag,

Make a dragon body with three heads.
Below it, make a dragon pond in the four directions.
Place gold in the center of the dragon pond.

Draw a dragon on the body with realgar.

analyzed: 於壇四角各置一滿瓶水。
translated: Place a full bottle of water in each of the four corners of the altar.
Also place four incense burners.
Place four new earthenware basins.

translated: Also, separately make a square altar of four cubits and smear it with cow dung.
Again, use flour to draw the altar.
In the altar, insert four arrows.
Wrap them with five-colored thread and hang five-colored banners.

Scatter seven kinds of grains inside the altar.
Arrange food of five colors, as well as flowers and fruits.
